title: Addition Property
text: The addition property of inequality: if $$a \geq b$$, then $$a+c \geq b+c$$
speech: The addition property of inequality: if  a is greater than or equal to, b , then  a, plus c is greater than or equal to, b plus c

title: Multiplication Property
text: The multiplication property of inequality: If $$a \geq b$$ and $$c>0$$, then $$ac \geq bc;$$ if $$a \geq b$$ and $$c<0$$, then $$ac \leq bc$$.
speech: The multiplication property of inequality: If  a is greater than or equal to b  and  c, is greater than 0 , then  a c is greater than or equal to, b c colon  if  a, is greater than or equal to b  and  c, is less than 0 , then  a c is less than or equal to, b c .

, then   a c is less than or equal to, b c
